医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CXCL13浓度的新阈值彻底改变了神经疏螺旋体病的诊断新定义的细胞因子 CXCL13 浓度阈值可能会改善神经疏螺旋体病的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/New-threshold-for-CXCL13-concentration-revolutionizes-neuroborreliosis-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/New-threshold-for-CXCL13-concentration-revolutionizes-neuroborreliosis-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7370c34f-2ddc-4257-b7b6-8348fca68546 Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:14:00 -0400 New threshold for CXCL13 concentration revolutionizes neuroborreliosis diagnosis
简单的措施有助于解决老年人护理中的营养不良问题住院和其他医疗机构的所有患者中多达一半营养不良。这会给个人带来不必要的痛苦、生活质量下降和死亡率下降等严重后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Simple-measures-can-help-address-malnutrition-in-elderly-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Simple-measures-can-help-address-malnutrition-in-elderly-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed5181b0-ffd2-4562-b8ea-a0f2283cb34f Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:28:45 -0400 Simple measures can help address malnutrition in elderly care
选择用于 2024 年巴黎奥运会和残奥会期间废水监测的优先病原体法国国家公共卫生研究所的研究人员进行的这项研究旨在确定适合于分别于 7 月 26 日至 8 月 11 日和 8 月 28 日至 9 月 8 日举行的 2024 年巴黎奥运会和残奥会期间进行废水监测 (WWS) 的优先病原体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Priority-pathogens-selected-for-wastewater-surveillance-during-Paris-2024-Olympic-and-Paralympic-Games.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Priority-pathogens-selected-for-wastewater-surveillance-during-Paris-2024-Olympic-and-Paralympic-Games.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8fdff4f-5a04-49f3-bf78-5110368ff9db Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:21:08 -0400 Priority pathogens selected for wastewater surveillance during Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games
针对儿童和青少年的技术辅助治疗与传统的面对面治疗一样有效最新研究表明，利用技术为儿童和青少年提供治疗与传统的面对面治疗一样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Technology-auxiliary-therapy-for-kids-and-young-people-is-as- effective-as-traditional-face-to-face-therapy。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Technology-auxiliary-therapy-for-kids-and-young-people-is-as- effective-as-traditional-face-to-face-therapy。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1868844-d57a-4fd6-bb38-61d4c647e584 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:11:00 -0400 Technology-assisted therapy for kids and young people is as effective as traditional face-to-face therapy
研究人员确定了根据情境需求调整听力的大脑区域您是否注意到，当您集中注意力时，您会突然听到冰箱在背景中嗡嗡作响？或者即使在喧闹的人群中，你的名字如何立即引起你的注意？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Researchers-identify-brain-region-that-tunes-hearing-to-contextual-needs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Researchers-identify-brain-region-that-tunes-hearing-to-contextual-needs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=502918cf-f2e4-4b1d-a107-33ff70600828 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:08:18 -0400 Researchers identify brain region that tunes hearing to contextual needs
ECHO 研究揭示了大流行期间邻里环境如何影响儿童的福祉COVID-19 大流行严重扰乱了日常生活，并引发了人们对其对儿童福祉影响的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/ECHO-study-sheds-light-on-how-neighborhood-environment-influenced-childs-well-being-amid-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/ECHO-study-sheds-light-on-how-neighborhood-environment-influenced-childs-well-being-amid-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c549ffd-ee4f-4a32-a35a-4e868ded9c50 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 22:54:54 -0400 ECHO study sheds light on how neighborhood environment influenced child's well-being amid pandemic
数字接触者追踪数据揭示了英格兰和威尔士的详细流行模式以英格兰和威尔士国家卫生服务 (NHS) COVID-19 应用程序为例，数字接触者追踪数据以前所未有的细节揭示了流行病动态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Digital-contact-tracing-data-reveals-detailed-epidemic-patterns-in-England-and-Wales.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Digital-contact-tracing-data-reveals-detailed-epidemic-patterns-in-England-and-Wales.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=983fa3ab-5154-4da9-82ed-326adadd620d Fri, 12 Jul 2024 22:49:55 -0400 Digital contact tracing data reveals detailed epidemic patterns in England and Wales
WISDOM 项目利用人工智能和数据来对抗欧洲的慢性免疫介导疾病整合医疗和研究数据、确保安全的数据共享以及使用先进的人工智能模型，为减轻影响 10% 欧洲人的慢性免疫介导疾病 (CIMD) 的影响提供了巨大的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/WISDOM-project-leverages-AI-and-data-to-combat-chronic-immune-media-diseases-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/WISDOM-project-leverages-AI-and-data-to-combat-chronic-immune-media-diseases-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07b1e9f4-b0cc-4eff-90ac-5b4749de11fb Fri, 12 Jul 2024 22:46:15 -0400 WISDOM project leverages AI and data to combat chronic immune-mediated diseases in Europe
睡眠时间短和长与新诊断的糖尿病患者的微血管疾病有关将于今年欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（马德里，9 月 9 日至 13 日）上公布的新研究表明，最近被诊断患有糖尿病的人睡眠时间短或长更有可能出现微血管病变疾病（小血管损伤），最终可能导致更严重的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/and-long-sleep-duration-linked-to-microangio-disease-in-newly-diagnosed-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/and-long-sleep-duration-linked-to-microangio-disease-in-newly-diagnosed-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=211bce4c-010d-4618-b702-c314272853d0 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 22:42:00 -0400 Short and long sleep duration linked to microvascular disease in newly diagnosed diabetics
研究发现非处方鼻喷雾剂可使呼吸道感染减少 20%广泛使用的非处方鼻喷雾剂可以预防上呼吸道感染，如感冒、胸部感染、流感、喉咙痛和鼻窦感染，并防止全面症状的发展，这是迄今为止最大规模的试验之一测试他们的有效性发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Over-the-counter-nasal-sprays-cut-respiratory-infections-by-2025-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Over-the-counter-nasal-sprays-cut-respiratory-infections-by-2025-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dad77f0-cad1-4b46-a254-470c2c1204a0 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 22:38:00 -0400 Over-the-counter nasal sprays cut respiratory infections by 20%, study finds
